## createEditorUiTheme() function

Creates a function that maps [EditorThemeProps](./ui.editorthemeprops.md) to the current theme of the specified editor UI component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createEditorUiTheme<K extends keyof EditorUiTheme>(
  key: K,
  createDefaultTheme: EditorUiThemeFactory<K>
): (theme: {
  editor: EditorTheme
  editorUi: DeepPartial<EditorUiTheme>
}) => EditorUiTheme[K]
```

## Parameters

| Parameter          | Type                                                                  | Description                                                       |
| ------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| key                | K                                                                     | The editor UI component                                           |
| createDefaultTheme | [EditorUiThemeFactory](./ui.editoruithemefactory.md)<!-- -->&lt;K&gt; | The [factory](./ui.editoruithemefactory.md) for the default theme |

<b>Returns:</b>

(theme: { editor: [EditorTheme](./ui.editortheme.md)<!-- -->; editorUi: [DeepPartial](./ui.deeppartial.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EditorUiTheme](./ui.editoruitheme.md)<!-- -->&gt;; }) =&gt; [EditorUiTheme](./ui.editoruitheme.md)<!-- -->\[K\]

A function that accepts [EditorThemeProps](./ui.editorthemeprops.md) and returns the current theme of the specified component
